casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the FRED POLIZZI, SR., EDUCATION TRUST Pamela Arteaga, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Robyn Sallustro and Maryann Aboyoun f/k/a Maryann Meyer, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Fred Polizzi, Jr., Defendant. C-921 September Term 2018
082076 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 3, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002089-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
